url.description: The url to make the call to

file.description: The optional file to use as a body. Can be a public url or a file from a git repository

filevars.description: The optional keys to replace in the file body

body.description: The optional keys and values to add to the request body

headers.description: The optional headers to add to the request

query.description: The optional query parameters to add to the request

expects.description: The optional http code(s) required for the step to succeed

failon.description: The optional http code(s) that will always make the step fail

git.description: A git repository containing the file for the request body

connection.description: A Relay SSH connection to use

sshKey.description: The SSH key to use when cloning the git repository.

name.description: A directory name for the git clone.
